akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 109–162, title III, § 304(f), Jan. 5, 2006, 119 Stat. 3016

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1152. Repealed. Pub. L. 109–162, title III, § 304(f), Jan. 5, 2006, 119 Stat. 3016
Section, Pub. L. 105–244, title VIII, § 826, Oct. 7, 1998, 112 Stat. 1815; Pub. L. 106–386, div. B, title I, § 1108(a), title V, § 1512(d), Oct. 28, 2000, 114 Stat. 1500, 1533; Pub. L. 109–162, title XI, § 1135(d), Jan. 5, 2006, 119 Stat. 3109; Pub. L. 109–271, §§ 2(d), 8(b), Aug. 12, 2006, 120 Stat. 752, 766, related to grants to combat violent crimes against women on campuses.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective beginning fiscal year 2007, see section 4 of Pub. L. 109–162, set out as an Effective Date of 2006 Amendment note under section 10261 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
